p: Hence, taking ΔRSDS=ΔVWS=0 in equation (5), the change in PVpot due to a change in TAS can be obtained. Analogously, the change in PVpot due to the influence of changes in VWS alone is given by imposing ΔRSDS=ΔTAS=0 in equation (5). This is the procedure adopted here, as it was done in previous works 2 3 8. However, note that the cross-products in the last two terms of equation (5) make it impossible to fully isolate the contribution of each single field.
